```{r, lineplot, fig.align='center', fig.width=10, fig.height=8}
library(ggplot2)
x = seq(1:100)
y = rnorm(100)
dat = data.frame(x, y)
ggplot(dat, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
geom_line()
```
